These patient randomize one two group study . Group 1 : Focal ablation prostate side positive biopsy ( focal-ablation ) Group 2 : Extended ablation prostate ( extended ablation ) Patients ultrasound prostate imaging data enter Planning Software system IRE-device . The volume prostate measure specified ablation zone determine . The patient admit overnight stay hospital morning schedule IRE procedure . The IRE perform general anaesthetic specify zone identify planning stage ablate . Two four IRE electrode needle place prostate ultrasound image guidance perineal approach use brachytherapy grid . When needles place , electric pulse one two minute duration use ablate specify zone . The total procedure time approximately 1 hour .
